headline.main: ACCORD IN MOSCOW; 3 Conferees Fix Steps to 'Shorten War' -- China Joins Peace Pledge

lead_paragraph: MOSCOW, Nov. 1 -- Cordell Hull, United States Secretary of State; Anthony Eden, British Foreign Secretary, and Vyacheslaff M. Molotoff, Soviet Foreign Commissar, announced tonight that their Governments had agreed to closer collaboration in the conduct of the war and pledged the creation of an international organization to maintain future world peace and security -- a declaration to which China adhered as an original signatory.
